pages.text: $(li)The Curse of Binding enchantment can be applied in any kind of Helmet, Chestplate, Leggins, Boots or even $(l:patchouli:armors/elytra)$(l:patchouli:armors/elytra)Elytra$(/l)s$(/l).$(br)$(li)This cursed enchantment prevents the item from being removed from an armor slot.
